definition: to take possession of/to occupy/to take up
thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

sentences.english: I tried to call him, but the line was busy.
sentences.chinese: 我试过打电话给他，但电话占线。

sentences.english: B:On your call to Taiwan,the line is busy now.Will you place your call again later?
sentences.chinese: 您申请的台湾电话对方正在占线，稍后再挂过来好吗？

sentences.english: Busy signal detected at remote site on callback.
sentences.chinese: 在远程站点回拨时检测到了占线信号。

sentences.english: The issue of Bahncard is the promotion of the leasing problem.
sentences.chinese: 占线优惠卡问题是租赁问题的推广。

sentences.english: I’ve been trying to call her, but I keep getting a busy signal.
sentences.chinese: 我不停地打电话给她，但老是占线。

sentences.english: I call her contiousely,but it's always busy.
sentences.chinese: 我不停地打电话给她，但老是占线。

sentences.english: A: I’ve been trying to get a hold of Jim for an hour, but the line is busy.
sentences.chinese: 我给Jim打了一个小时的电话，但总是占线。

sentences.english: I’m sorry but the number is engaged. We’ll call you if connected.
sentences.chinese: 很抱歉电话占线，如果接通了我们就给您打电话。

sentences.english: Why is it that when you dial a wrong number, it is never busy?
sentences.chinese: 为什么你拨错的电话，从不占线？

sentences.english: The line's busy at the moment.
I tried to call Ms. Dole, but the line was busy.
sentences.chinese: 我试着给Dole女士打电话，但是占线。

sentences.english: I can’t put you through to Mr. Weng right now. His phone is busy.
sentences.chinese: 对不起，翁先生现在接不过去，他的电话占线。

sentences.english: I wanted to book at that restaurant, but the line was always busy.
sentences.chinese: 我想电话包席，可饭店那边一直占线。

sentences.english: I kept dailing her phone number, but the line was always busy.
sentences.chinese: 我不停地打电话给她，但老是占线。

sentences.english: I tried, sir, but the fax line has been busy for the Iast ten minutes.
sentences.chinese: 我试过了，先生，但是这十分钟对方的传真都占线。

sentences.english: I tried to call Miss dole, but the line was busy.
sentences.chinese: 我试着给dole女士打电话，但是占线。

definition: to turn off (a machine or device)/to finish shooting a film
to reject/to refuse to take a call
to reply to a telegram/to wire back

incoming telegram or telephone call/your telegram, telephone call, or message/to send a telegram or make a telephone call here (i.e. to the speaker)/to have instant attraction to sb/to have chemistry with sb/to come back (of electricity, after an outage)
